title: Including gem icon into files API?

comments.author: AfterXII.2761
comments.body:
Lawton Campbell.8517:

Yeah, I can look into it. There was some reason I didn’t include it initially, though I can’t remember why at the moment.

Oh okay great! Yea, I kind of figured as much. If you can’t, that’s fine too.

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: Yeah, I can look into it. There was some reason I didn’t include it initially, though I can’t remember why at the moment.

comments.author: AfterXII.2761
comments.body:
Hey Lawton/Pat,

Would it be possible to include your smaller gem icon from in game into the files API? I have a few tools I’m working on that could definitely benefit from having a workable gem icon.
